section.title: sales history archiving of Archive Sales History
section.para: If your system contains Sales history which is no longer required for Sales Analysis purposes, you may archive that history—effectively removing it from view. Archived Sales history may be restored to view at any point. To archive Sales history, select the "Archive Sales History" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Archiving Sales history does not delete Sales history. Rather, the historical data is simply relocated to a storage archive on the database. You may restore Sales history from the archive at any time.

section.para: When archiving Sales history, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to archive Sales history for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose Sales history you want to archive.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select to archive Sales history for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose Sales history you want to archive.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .

varlistentry.term: Archive Freight, Sales Tax and Misc. Items

listitem.para: Select to archive all the sales information which is not directly related to the Item Sites for a Sales Order—that is, Freight charges, Tax, etc.
Select to archive Sales history for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Sales history you want to archive.
Sales history generated on or after this date will be archived.
Sales history by Shipping Zone by Item generated on or before this date will be archived.
